ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-B IMPACT (In-Situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients) Suprathermal Electron Telescope (STE) 10-s Level 1 Electron Spectra
ResourceHeader.Description: The IMPACT Suprathermal Electron (STE) Telescope data consist of 10-sec resolution electron counts from each of 8 sensors in each of 32 energy bands that span 1.9 keV to 100 keV. Only four sensors provide unsaturated data that are scientifically usable.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IMPACT P.I., Janet Luhmann of UCB

InformationURL.Name: Lin and Wang STE page at UCB

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: With subset, plot and ASCII list functions from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the P.I., Janet Luhmann of UCB, and CDAWeb at GSFC/SPDF

NumericalData.Caveats: The four sensors labelled "U" and numbered 1-4 are saturated and should not be used. Sensors providing usable data are labelled "D" and are numbered 5-8.

Parameter.Name: Electron distribution function
Parameter.Description: Electron counts in each of 32 energy bands between 1.9 keV and 100 keV, from each of 8 differently pointed but otherwise similar sensors
